input_data.observations: {"thought":"Submit the login form.","action":{"tool":"click","args":{"selector":".oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--main.orangehrm-login-button"}},"tool_result":{"status":"success","redirected_to":"/dashboard","elements_visible":["Dashboard","Time at Work","My Actions"]}}

input_data.observations: {'thought':'I want to search leave records. The Search button is visible near the bottom right around coordinates [720,750,820,950]. I should click the Search button.','action':{'tool':'browser_click','args':{'selector':'.oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--secondary.orangehrm-left-space'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','message':'No Records Found'}}

user_query: Search for leave records using the current filters.

expected_output.thought: The tool_result indicates that after clicking Search, the system returned No Records Found. The task is complete as the search executed successfully.
expected_output.final_answer: Search executed. No leave records were found for the selected date range.

To modify this timesheet I should click Edit.','action':{'tool':'browser_click','args':{'selector':'.oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--ghost'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','mode':'edit-enabled'}}

input_data.observations: {'thought':'To navigate to the next time period, I should click the next arrow button located around [210,820,260,860].','action':{'tool':'click_element','args':{'selector':'.oxd-icon-button.orangehrm-timeperiod-icon.--next'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','new_period':'2023-23-01 to 2023-29-01'}}

user_query: Go to the next timesheet period.

expected_output.thought: The tool_result confirms the timesheet period has changed to the next range.
expected_output.final_answer: Navigated to the next timesheet period successfully.

input_data.observations: {'thought':'The Actions Performed section is partially visible around [500,200,850,950]. I will scroll down 400 pixels to fully review it.','action':{'tool':'browser_scroll','args':{'direction':'down','amount':400}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','scrolled':400}}

user_query: Scroll down to review actions performed on the timesheet.

expected_output.final_answer: Scrolled down to review the actions performed on the timesheet.

input_data.observations: {'thought':'The timesheet is currently in edit mode. To discard changes and exit edit mode, I should click the Cancel button.','action':{'tool':'browser_click','args':{'selector':'.oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--ghost'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','mode':'view'}}

expected_output.final_answer: Editing has been cancelled and the timesheet is back to view mode.

input_data.observations: {'thought':'To save the changes made in the timesheet, I should click the Save button.','action':{'tool':'browser_click','args':{'selector':'.oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--secondary'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','message':'Timesheet updated successfully'}}

user_query: Save the edited timesheet.

expected_output.thought: The tool_result confirms the timesheet has been updated successfully.
expected_output.final_answer: The edited timesheet has been saved successfully.

input_data.observations: {'thought':'To clear all entered values in the form, I should click the Reset button.','action':{'tool':'browser_click','args':{'selector':'.oxd-button.oxd-button--medium.oxd-button--ghost'}},'tool_result':{'status':'success','form':'cleared'}}

input_data.observations: Notion homepage is visible with a prominent Join Notion button in the top right and a Log in link next to it.

user_query: Click on Join Notion to create a new account.

expected_output.thought: The Join Notion button is clearly visible with selector .button_button__atjat.button_buttonVariantPrimary__mUFQZ.button_buttonSizeM__NexGD. I will click it to start account creation.
expected_output.final_answer: Clicked Join Notion to start creating a new account.

tools.name: click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

input_data.observations: The Notion homepage is displayed and the Log in link is available in the top navigation bar.

user_query: Click on Log in to access my existing account.

expected_output.thought: The Log in link is visible with selector .globalNavigation_link__ofzIw and text Log in. I will click it to access the login page.
expected_output.final_answer: Navigated to the Notion login page.

tools.name: click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

input_data.observations: The top navigation bar includes a Pricing link among other options like Product, AI, Solutions, and Resources.

expected_output.thought: The Pricing link is present in the top navigation with selector .globalNavigation_link__ofzIw. I will click it to view pricing plans.
expected_output.final_answer: Opened the Pricing page to view available plans.

input_data.observations: The pricing page is visible with plan cards including Free, Plus, Business, and Enterprise.

expected_output.thought: The Business plan card has a primary 'Get started' button with selector .button_button__atjat.button_buttonVariantPrimary__mUFQZ.button_buttonSizeM__NexGD.PricingPlanCard_cta__PJ9IV. I will click it.
expected_output.final_answer: Clicked Get started for the Business plan.
